name: Blended Strawberry Daiquiri
description: Decorate this blended strawberry daiquiri with a fresh strawberry for an extra presentation touch. Serve in a martini glass with a straw.

name: Mexican Rice
description: This is an excellent authentic Mexican rice recipe (not to be confused with Spanish rice) that I make as a side dish with all of my Mexican dishes. The key is cooking the rice properly and using good quality chicken broth or stock.
